The claim was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and featured the World Health Organization's logo, as well as images of Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and Army Commander General Shavendra Silva.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image stated that the WHO declared Sri Lanka's response to Covid-19 as the world's fifth best among nations battling the pandemic. It also mentioned the number of votes secured by President Rajapaksa in the 2019 election and the current population of Sri Lanka.
The claim has been circulating on Facebo: 4. The WHO's Sri Lanka division confirmed that no ranking or comparison of pandemic responses by different countries had been carried out. Additionally, there is no international ranking for countries based on their coronavirus response available on the WHO's website.
